projects.title: CDORental
projects.details: An online platform ensures seamless communication between lessors and lessees, streamlining interactions with a user-friendly interface and a range of tools. We simplify the leasing process by facilitating viewings, negotiations, and payments, enhancing the experience for both property owners and tenants.

projects.title: eTCMF - Web
projects.details: A web-based platform has been developed to empower traffic enforcers, enabling them to efficiently monitor traffic violation citations and generate comprehensive reports for improved traffic management and enforcement.

projects.title: eTCMF - Mob
projects.details: The system enables users to generate citations through manual input or OCR methods, fostering real-time monitoring of violations and facilitating spontaneous data transfers for efficient and immediate information exchange.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.details: Visit my portfolio website to explore a curated collection of my work, showcasing a blend of web development projects and captivating graphic design pieces. Get a glimpse of my skills, creativity, and dedication to delivering impactful digital solutions.

projects.title: MissArt
projects.details: An online platform facilitates clients in booking MissArt artists while providing administrators with the capability to post updates on recent art projects for seamless artist-client interactions and project management.
